Sentencas: The slow kinetics of oxygen surface exchange hinders the efficiency of high-temperature oxygen electrocatalytic devices such as solid oxide fuel cells and oxygen separation membranes.
Titulo: Tuning the Spin State in LaCoO3 Thin Films for Enhanced High-Temperature Oxygen Electrocatalysis

Sentencas: Systematic investigations of material properties that link to catalytic activity can aid in the rational design of highly active cathode materials.
Titulo: Tuning the Spin State in LaCoO3 Thin Films for Enhanced High-Temperature Oxygen Electrocatalysis

Sentencas: Here, we explore LaCoO3 thin films as a model system for tuning catalytic activity through strain-induced changes in the Co spin state.
Titulo: Tuning the Spin State in LaCoO3 Thin Films for Enhanced High-Temperature Oxygen Electrocatalysis

Sentencas: We demonstrate that Raman spectroscopy can be used to probe the Co-O bond strength at different temperatures to determine the relative spin occupancies of LaCoO3.
Titulo: Tuning the Spin State in LaCoO3 Thin Films for Enhanced High-Temperature Oxygen Electrocatalysis

Sentencas: We find that strain can be used to reduce the spin transition temperature and promote the occupation of higher spin states that weaken the Co-O bond.
Titulo: Tuning the Spin State in LaCoO3 Thin Films for Enhanced High-Temperature Oxygen Electrocatalysis

Sentencas: The decrease in Co-O bond strength and increased spin moment of the thin films result in significant enhancements of the oxygen surface exchange kinetics by up to 2 orders of magnitude.
Titulo: Tuning the Spin State in LaCoO3 Thin Films for Enhanced High-Temperature Oxygen Electrocatalysis
